job_tasks.phrase: Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server, on platforms like Azure and AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibilities of building and maintaining software systems using specific programming languages and platforms, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors. If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues.
job_tasks.justification: This outlines a typical software development recruitment process including technical assessments (coding challenge) and team interviews.

job_tasks.phrase: Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction. This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing.
job_tasks.justification: This section describes the company's business domain, its products, and the value proposition for its customers, indicating a need for understanding the business context.

soft_skills.phrase: Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on traditional software development using Microsoft technologies and cloud platforms. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, diffusion models, or related concepts, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. Therefore, it aligns more with traditional software engineering roles.
